title: Greek language and people. Episodes 1-5
brief_description: A compilation tape that consist of five programmes designed to aquaint the viewer with aspects of Greek culture while at the same time providing elementary Greek vocabulary. The individual tittles indicate the content of each program. This series is also avaiLable in 10 episodes under title number 305309.
